thread.title: US to move forward with hosting 2016 Copa America
thread.title_full: US to move forward with hosting 2016 Copa America

title: US to move forward with hosting 2016 Copa America
text:
Published By: Fox News: Sports - Today 
MIAMI BEACH, Fla. (AP) The U.S. Soccer Federation has agreed to move ahead with hosting next year's Centennial Copa America....
